name: shipgate-monorepo
description: Shipgate - Formal verification toolkit powered by ISL with open-source core and paid tiers

scripts.build: pnpm --filter "@shipgate/shared" build && pnpm --filter "@shipgate/core" build && pnpm --filter "@shipgate/runtime" build && pnpm --filter "@shipgate/compliance" build && pnpm --filter "@shipgate/action" build
scripts.typecheck: pnpm --filter "@shipgate/shared" typecheck && pnpm --filter "@shipgate/core" typecheck && pnpm --filter "@shipgate/runtime" typecheck && pnpm --filter "@shipgate/compliance" typecheck && pnpm --filter "@shipgate/action" typecheck
